thread.title: Van Jones Says It’s ‘Unfair’ That People Hold Kamala Harris And Donald Trump To Different Standards
thread.title_full: Van Jones Says It’s ‘Unfair’ That People Hold Kamala Harris And Donald Trump To Different Standards

author: Jamal Osborne
title: Van Jones Says It’s ‘Unfair’ That People Hold Kamala Harris And Donald Trump To Different Standards
text: CNN political commentator Van Jones is tired of people holding [Kamala Harris](https://hollywoodunlocked.com/?s=Kamala+Harris+) and Donald Trump to different standards. On Wednesday, Van Jones weighed in on the tight race between the two candidates. CNN’s Erin Burnett questioned Jones about a new report from The Wall Street Journal showing Trump is leading by nearly 10 percent in the upcoming election. [RELATED: Beyonce To Reportedly Join Kamala Harris At Campaign Rally In Houston](https://hollywoodunlocked.com/beyonce-to-reportedly-join-kamala-harris-at-campaign-rally-in-houston/) “Kamala Harris and Donald Trump are not taking the same exam,” Jones replied. “I think it bothers people. They’re not taking the same exam. He gets to be lawless. She has to be flawless. That’s what’s unfair.” “She has policies, she may not articulate them perfectly every time, she may not put the stories in the right places, but she’s fighting for actual ideas that will help real people, and he’s talking about peoples’ penises,” Jones added. Jones’ comments comes after a panel discussion on CNN took place about Harris’ performance at a town hall hosted by the network, where she took questions from undecided and persuadable voters in Pennsylvania, a key battleground in the election. Most recently, Kamala Harris has been slamming Donald Trump for his praise of Adolf Hitler. “It is deeply troubling and incredibly dangerous that Donald Trump would invoke Adolf Hitler — the man who is responsible for the deaths of 6 million Jews, and hundreds of thousands of Americans,” Harris said from her residence at the Naval Observatory in Washington. [RELATED: Antonio Brown Praises Donald Trump And Slams Kamala Harris & ‘Tampon Tim’ Walz At Pennsylvania Rally ](https://hollywoodunlocked.com/antonio-brown-praises-donald-trump-and-slams-kamala-harris-tampon-tim-walz-at-pennsylvania-rally/) Harris’ comments comes after interviews were released on Tuesday by The New York Times when former White House chief of staff John Kelly revealed that he caught Donald Trump often expressing admiration for Hitler, claiming that the Nazi leader had accomplished “some good things.” On Tuesday, Trump campaign spokesperson Steven Cheung refuted Kelly’s allegations, asserting to NBC News that Harris is spreading “outright lies.”
